name: RANCID
description:
It's time to BLAST some BUGS!!!! Some VERY VERY BIG BUGS. RANCID will follow the soldier/investigator Emma Ross as she leads a mission to the strange and mysterious island of Utope. Several scientific and recon teams have gone missing and all communications has been severed to the outside world and the island of Utope. Doctor Robert Kale is the mastermind behind the mutated bugs on the island. Doctor Kale is using an advanced biological space age science and mixing it with Earth bio-engineered super serums to transform bugs and people into mutated creatures. Emma Ross is determined to stop Doctor Kale's schemes and will have no problem using her many weapons (shotgun, machete, machine gun to name a few :) to bring him down.

Doctor Kale has anticipated the possibility of a single soldier infiltrating the island so he has sent out 5 mutated super insects (with the back up of their separate armies) all across the island. Emma will have to survive:

THE HORNET'S NEST
ANT BEACH
COCKROACH VILLAGE
DRAGON FLY JUNGLE
THE SPIDER'S DEN
THE CENTIPEDE MAZE

...along with the many many challenges along the way if she wants to save the island of Utope.
